channel.title: looking for a village
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "looking for a village" - for the sannin exam (14 days til loop so i still have to prepare but i'll atempt soon)

item.title: Re: looking for a village
item.content:encoded: you can join Manifest Village for Sannin if you like.

item.title: Re: looking for a village
item.content:encoded: You could go to a village and have a kage do the looking for you. Plus, the Kage in the IAF village MIGHT help you look, but you could just tell me if you accept,so i tell tell the Kage.Oh, and they are in the ninja world war.

item.title: Re: looking for a village
item.content:encoded:
BUMB…

does noone know a village i could join for a day or two for my sannin atempt?

it would be so awesome… i'm almost done prepairing but i need o be in the village in 4 days! please answer if you know a village or even better if you are the kage of a village with an epic monument!

4 days would be the best but if thats not possible i'll just atempt sannin and then loop later on?

Thark

item.title: Re: looking for a village
item.content:encoded:
oh lol!

i didn't even check, cuz i wouldn have expect someone to answer when they don't have an epic monument…

so well then … BUMB

is there any villageleader reading this who would axcept me for a day or 2? (prolly 2 days cuz i wanna become sanin and loop on the same day)

mfg
Thark

item.title: Re: looking for a village
item.content:encoded: I checked, and IAF Village isn't even in the war. You can't possibly become a sannin there. -.-;;

item.title: Re: looking for a village
item.content:encoded: cool thing :) i will apply in like 4-5 days or so … i'll run some missions to earn money and then i'll apply :)

item.title: Re: looking for a village
item.content:encoded: i will be happy to accept you to the IAF village , just applay and i will accept you

item.title: looking for a village
item.content:encoded:
hey,

i was wondering if there are any village leaders here who might take me into their village for a week or so, so that i can atempt my sannin run … because i'd like to become sannin, be number one and loop on the same day! i will leave the village right after that if you wish. this is gonna be a serius atempt (well i'm in season 1 still) and i'd promise not to spy or atack your village ever again nor to bingo your ninja ;) - hope this will chage someones mind ;)

greetings
Thark

ps: if this is the wrong place to ask for this, could you be so kind and move it? cuz the recruiting area seemed to be only for villages seeking new members.
